title: Иоанн Креститель
author: Melnikov Alexander
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'John the Baptist' is related to religious surrealism being a representative of religion genre. The narrative behind the paintings is inspired by the story of Jesus baptism by John the desciple.

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
